name: Myutant Fusion
text: Fusion Summon 1 "Myutant" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your hand or field. If your opponent has activated a card or effect this turn, you can use up to 1 monster each from your Deck and GY as Fusion Material. You can only activate 1 "Myutant Fusion" per turn.
